scripts.say: The King draws closer as if engulfing you... You cannot escape.
And suddenly, I'm surrounded... So you've been hiding your talent for combat all along.
"All warfare is based on deception." I planned this before the wargames had even begun.
Guh...! How is that humanly possible...
Even in the midst of gunfire and explosions you manage to stay calm and adjust your strategy and issue commands...
I admit total defeat. Deal with me however you want.
Ahaha... Then could I ask you to start calling me "Amagi-san" from now on?
You witch...! Stop being so full of yourself...!
Their lighthearted conversation continued for a short while.
One thing has been on my mind. Your strategies involve throwing caution to the wind somewhat.
Then what if today had not been a wargame, but a real battle...? Could you have actually...
